actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agriculture Act of 1949 to require that the proclamation made by the Secretary of Agriculture with respect to the national program acreage for feed grains to be made no later than October 1 of each year for crops harvested in the next succeeding calendar year.

summary.text: Amends the Agriculture Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to proclaim a national program acreage for feed grains no later than October 1 (currently November 15) of each year for crops harvested in the next succeeding calendar year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agriculture Act of 1949 to require that the proclamation made by the Secretary of Agriculture with respect to the national program acreage for feed grains to be made no later than October 1 of each year for crops harvested in the next succeeding calendar year.
